comment: She's very hard to read as person. I took her for microbio lecture and lab. Class was extremely unorganized and hard to follow. Not a fan of her sarcastic humor. Gave extra credit though

I thought this class was really interesting and engaging. The way Latimore connects the material to real life made it very easy to follow in lecture. Homework was basically js completion grade and her exams were not bad (uses webcam so actually study). Class connected to lab. She treated us like her peers which was nice. Overall, would take again!

ok so best teacher i've ever had she was my homegirl frl she really was a great teacher she really cares about you and your grade. I surprisingly understand micro because of her! i took her lab and lecture i came out w a B in lab but! :( at the end of the day take her. she will help you understand micro and she funny DONT CHEAT IN HER CLASS THOUGH.

Lab was energetic but often disorganized. She was usually late due to campus scheduling, and instructions weren't always clear. Asking questions could feel intimidating, but the videos she sent before some labs really helped. Grading was inconsistent—some labs graded hard, others barely looked at. Not terrible, but definitely challenging.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She's hilarious and sarcastic, yet also compassionate and firm. Her vibe is chill, but she's serious about readings, doing the work, and absolutely no cheating—seriously, don't. She's clear about expectations and provides great materials to help you prep and succeed. If you put in the effort, you'll be fine.

BLESSING TAKE HER. She is hilarious, sarcastic and outgoing and makes microbiology so engaging by incorporating clinical and pathological effects of the microorganisms, but definitely get on her good side. I had her for lab (harsh grader) and lecture. Class isn't mandatory but you do get extra credit. Goes out of her way to teach you. Late a lot

Take her!! She is definitely sarcastic (told us 1st day of class she can be an A-hole) but she is very caring at the same time. She demonstrates all labs before you do it. READ THE LAB MANUAL AHEAD!!! She will ask about it during class and gets upset if you don't know the answers. First lab i've had that was actually fun. Gives nursing advice too:)
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: I had her for microbio lab, she is a very tough grader for lab assignments and has high expectations for the students. READ YOUR LAB MANUAL BEFORE CLASS. She is still a good professor and would recommend. She is chill and funny.

She can come across harsh and moves fast but she just wants what's best for you and to help you out. She's actually rly fun but has expectations. I was nervous the first few labs but literally ended with a 100 in the class

She has 2 full time jobs which is very understandable if she is late/cancels. I would say what is difficult about her is that she moves too fast and is more of a person to explain just once. She expects you to READ them manuals. Other than thats shes not terrible. I would say first day of class she said she can be an A-hole.

While she is understanding when it comes to emergencies, she was often 10-15 minutes late, canceled labs last minute, and did not communicate well whether or not class was remaining. This can be a blessing or a curse depending on what type of student you are. I would choose a different professor if you need extra help with microbiology.
rating_tags: Tough grader--EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things

comment: Great class!! If you have to take this class definitely take her! She keeps her class readable and is very young so she knows how to relate to her students! Midterm and final are cumulative. Expected to read pre-lab and complete pre-lab quiz before every class. She explains the labs very well and demonstrates all the labs before class!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: A really tough grader! Took her at a late time, class was small so she learned most of our names and she was really funny. She knows her stuff so reading labs before class is a must - she has high expectations for you. Extra credit is given which is nice bc she takes points off easily. She gives what she's going to ask on midterms. you cant fail.

AMAZING! I love this class and genuinely look forward to labs with Professor Latimore. She is hilarious and very easy to talk to. She teaches in a way that can be understood & is always willing to help out students. Class is easy if you pay attention. Also offers extra credit. 100% recommend, 10/5 stars. If you need a micro lab teacher PICK HER!!!
